channel.title: tor browser wont start after browser update
channel.description:
As the title says, no longer able to open tor after updating the browser
thanks

item.title: tor browser wont start after browser update
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
i have used the internal updater = working great. (im on 5.0.7)

you can re-install the TBB from whonix updater. or use iceweasel which inside the WS.

yes I was using the internal updater. perhaps this was where I was going wrong, am I only supposed to use the whonix updater?

See documentation.

item.title: tor browser wont start after browser update
item.dc:creator: Gavin
item.description:
yes I was using the internal updater. perhaps this was where I was going wrong, am I only supposed to use the whonix updater?

there was no error messages it simply wouldnt open but I did manage to reinstall it with the whonix updater

thanks

item.title: tor browser wont start after browser update
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Updated using Tor Browser internal updater?

Any error messages?

Please try starting it from the command line to see if there are any
error messages.

Or alternatively, if you not mind about the profile data to go through
back and forth process that has to the risk to lead nowhereâ€¦

All about the various Tor Browser update methods can be found here:
